alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale; Lawrence; Limestone; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 09 at 3:45PM CDT until August 09 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LIMESTONE...SOUTHEASTERN LAUDERDALE...NORTHWESTERN MORGAN AND NORTHEASTERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES... At 344 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Courtland, or 16 miles north of Moulton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Decatur, Athens, Trinity, Rogersville, Town Creek, Courtland, North Courtland, Hillsboro, Coxey and Oliver. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
